analyzed: iti atra jita indriya tvena vidheyasya vinaya kāraṇa tvasya śarīra praviṣṭa tayā vidheyasya vinayasya guṇa prakarṣa vidhau uddeśya tayā pratinirdeśaḥ

original: rāvaṇasyārthasya ayuktatāpādanārthameva vaktum ityasya vākyasya tathāprayuktatvena samarthanasyānaucityāt /

original: tathā sati yuktavena vaktumiṣṭaṃ vākyaṃ yuktamuktaṃ syāt /

vi ña aviśeṣe viśeṣa uktim āha hīrakāṇām iti atra iti

āvarttaḥ eva nābhiḥ te netre nīla saroruhe
bhaṅgāḥ ca valayaḥ tena tvam lāvaṇya ambu vāpikā
atra āvarte ekā iti niyamaḥ na vācyaḥ

original: iti karaṇe tu nābhāyāṃ rūpaṇayogyavāpīdharmāntarabhāvena vyāvarttanīyābhāvāttādṛśaniyamārthaka

evakāraḥ na yuktaḥ iti āha atra iti nābhiḥ eva iti evam nābhi pada uttaram ucitasya evakārasya āvartta uttara pāta dā sthāna stha pada tvam na āśaṅkanīyam

āpāta surase bhoge nimagnāḥ kim na kurvate

original: (vi, ḍha) asya vācyānabhidhānād bhedamāśaṅkate---nanviti---iha tvekārasyetyatrābhāva ityanvayaḥ /

original: atra samādhānasambhavaṃ darśayitvā doṣāntaraṃ darśayitumāha--atra niyamasyeti--atra niyamasyāvacanameva pṛthag bhūtaṃ viśeṣabhūtaṃ niyamaparivṛtterviṣaya  #

eva

original: kaṣṭārthatvarūpārthadoṣasya prathamamarthāpratyayācchabda evārthapratyāyaka iti jñānodayācchabda pratītyanantarameva bodhācca /

original: ataḥ prācīnairukto niyāmakaḥ kvaciccāsmaduktau niyāmaka iti dvividha eva niyāmaka iti vaktumāha---evañceti /

original: evaṃ hantītyasyāsamarthe 'pyeṣa eva niyamaḥ tameva svoktaniyamaṃ darśayati---yaścārthapratītyanantaramiti /

original: aślīlārthatve tu vākyavyāpitve 'pyarthānvayavyatirekānuvidhānādarthadoṣatvamiti hṛdayena vākyavyāpitvaṃ darśayati---aślīlatvādāviti /

ityādau iti anantaram artha pratīti anantara boddhyatve pi iti śeṣaḥ

original: aślīlatvādāviti--hantumevetyādau kvacid vākyavyāpitve 'pi kvacid vivaraiṣiṇa ityādau padaniṣṭatve 'pi sambhavānna vākyadoṣatetyarthaḥ /

vi taḥ vidhi ayukta tvam āha ānandita iti

original: atra parapakṣahananānantarameva svapakṣānandadānavidhāveva vidheyatātparyyāptyaucityaṃ natu parapakṣahananavidhau ityarthaḥ /

na ca atra vidheya avimarśaḥ iti vācyam

original: he candra māṃ vṛthā na kadarthaya ityanvayaḥ /

original: caṇḍīśetyādikamapi sambodhanatrayaṃ tadīyaikakālāyāstathātvāt sa eva tathātvena sambodhitaḥ /

original: “lagnaṃ rāgāvṛtāṅgyā sadṛḍhamiha yathaivāsiyaṣṭyāparikaṇṭhe mātaṅgānāmapīhopari parapuruṣairyā ca dṛṣṭā patantī /

original: tatsakto 'yaṃ na kiñcidraṇayati viditaṃ te 'stu tenāsmadattā bhṛtyebhyaḥ śrīniyogādraditumiti gatevāmbudhiṃ yasya kīrtiḥ //
analyzed: tad saktaḥ yam na kiñcid raṇayati viditam te stu tena asma dattā bhṛtyebhyaḥ śrī niyogāt raditum iti gatā iva ambudhim yasya kīrtiḥ

original: atra viditaṃ te 'stvityanena samāpitamapi vacanaṃ tenetyādinā punarupāttam /

vijña priyā

original: yasya rājñaḥ kīrttiramvudhiṃ gatā tatparyantagāminī tasya kīrttirityarthaḥ /
analyzed: yasya rājñaḥ kīrttiḥ amvudhim gatā tad paryanta gāminī tasya kīrttiḥ iti arthaḥ

original: gaditumiveti samudraputryāḥ śriyaḥ svapitarisvabhartturapacāraṃ gadituṃ preṣyāyāṃ kīrttau niyogaḥ /

original: tathā yāsiyaṣṭiriha jagati mātaṅgānāṃ hastināmeva mātaṅgānāṃ ṣiḍgānāṃ upari patantī parapuruṣaiḥ śatrupuruṣaireva prakṛṣṭapuruṣairdṛṣṭā /

original: (lo, a) atra śānteti---aṅgino bhagavadviṣayaratibhāvasya aṅgabhāvena viruddhānāmapi śāntādīnāṃ nānyo 'nyavirodha iti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: atra śānta iti aṅginaḥ bhagavat viṣaya rati bhāvasya aṅga bhāvena viruddhānām api śānta ādīnām na anyaḥ nyavirodhaḥ iti bhāvaḥ
yathā vā

original: “kṣipto hastāvalagnaḥ prasabhamabhihato 'pyādadānoṃ'śukāntaṃ gṛhṇan keśeṣvapāstaścaraṇanipatito nekṣitaḥ saṃbhrameṇa /
analyzed: kṣiptaḥ hasta avalagnaḥ prasabham abhihataḥ gṛhṇan keśeṣu apāstaḥ caraṇa nipatitaḥ na īkṣitaḥ saṃbhrameṇa

original: āliṅgan yo 'vadhūtastripurayuvatibhaiḥ sāśrunetrotpalābhiḥ kāmīvārdrāparādhaḥ sa dahatu duritaṃ śāmbhavo vaḥ śarāgniḥ” //
analyzed: āliṅgan yaḥ vadhūtaḥ tripura yuvati bhaiḥ sa aśru netra utpalābhiḥ kāmī iva ārdra aparādhaḥ sa dahatu duritam śāmbhavaḥ vaḥ śara agniḥ
vijña priyā

original: (vi, bha) itthamaṅgini virodhināṃ sākṣādavirodhaṃ darśayitvā sākṣāt paramparābhyāṃ tādṛśānāmavirodhamāha---yathā vā---kṣipta iti /
analyzed: ittham aṅgini virodhinām sākṣāt avirodham darśayitvā sākṣāt paramparābhyām tādṛśānām avirodham āha yathā vā ākṣiptaḥ iti

original: tripurudāhe sa prasiddhaḥ śāmbhavaḥ śarāgnirvo duritaṃ dahatu /
analyzed: tripuru dāhe sa prasiddhaḥ śāmbhavaḥ śara agniḥ vaḥ duritam dahatu

original: kīdṛśaḥ hastāvalagnaḥ san sāśrunetrotpalābhistripurayuvatibhirārdraparādhaḥ kāmīva kṣiptaḥ evamaṃśukasyāntamādadāno 'pi abhihataḥ /
analyzed: kīdṛśaḥ hasta avalagnaḥ san sa aśru netra utpalābhiḥ tripura yuvatibhiḥ ārdra aparādhaḥ kāmī iva kṣiptaḥ evam aṃśukasya antam ādadānaḥ pi abhihataḥ
apikāraḥ hi atra bhinna krame
tathā keśeṣu gṛhṇan apāstaḥ

original: kāmipakṣe---cumbanārthaṃ keśagrahaṇaṃ tathā caraṇanipātato 'gniḥ sambhrameṇa bhayena nekṣitaḥ /
analyzed: kāmi pakṣe cumbana artham keśa grahaṇam tathā caraṇa nipātataḥ gniḥ sambhrameṇa bhayena na īkṣitaḥ

original: kāmī tu caraṇanipatitaḥ saṃbhrameṇādareṇa yat īkṣaṇaṃ tadviṣayo na kṛtaḥ /
analyzed: kāmī tu caraṇa nipatitaḥ saṃbhrameṇa ādareṇa yat īkṣaṇam tad viṣayaḥ na kṛtaḥ
āliṅgan iti spaṣṭam
agni pakṣe bhayāt kāmi pakṣe krodhāt aśru
atra kavi gatā bhagavat viṣayā ratiḥ pradhānam

original: tasyāḥ paripoṣakatayā bhagavatastripuradhvaṃsaṃ pratyutsāhasyāparipuṣṭatayā rasapadavīmaprāptatayā bhāvamātrasya karuṇo 'ṅgam /
analyzed: tasyāḥ paripoṣaka tayā bhagavataḥ tripura dhvaṃsam pratyutsāhasya a paripuṣṭa tayā rasa padavīm aprāpta tayā bhāva mātrasya karuṇaḥ ṅgam
tasya ca kāmī iva iti sāmya balāt āyātaḥ śṛṅgāraḥ
evam ca aviśrānti dhāma tayā karuṇasya api aṅga tā eva iti dvayoḥ api karuṇa śṛṅgārayoḥ bhagavat utsāha paripuṣṭa tad viṣaya rati bhāva āsvāda prakaṣraka tayā yaugapadya sambhāvāt aṅga tvena
na virodhaḥ
vijña priyā
vi ma kavi gatā kavi niṣṭhā pradhānam

original: sa dahatu ityādi nirākāṅkṣavākyavyaṅgyatvāt ṣa tasyāśceti /
analyzed: sa dahatu ityādi nirākāṅkṣa vākya vyaṅgya tvāt ṣa tasyāḥ ca iti
tasyāḥ pradhānasya bhagavat utsāhaḥ tripuram vyaṅgyaḥ
sa ca tad mahattva sūcaka tvena tad viṣaya rati bhāvasya ādhikya rūpa puṣṭi kārakaḥ iti āha paripoṣaka tayā iti
utsāhaḥ rati bhāvasya aṅgam iti arthaḥ
tasya utsāhasya karuṇaḥ ṅgam iti anvayaḥ
nanu utsāhaḥ vīra rasa sthāyibhāvaḥ

original: sa cātra vyaṅgya ityato vīrarasa evātra pradhānam /
analyzed: sa ca atra vyaṅgyaḥ iti atas vīra rasaḥ eva atra pradhānam

original: tat kathaṃ ratibhāvasya prādhānyamuktam ityata āha---tasya cāparipuṣṭatayā iti /
analyzed: tat katham rati bhāvasya prādhānyam uktam iti atas āhatasya ca a paripuṣṭa tayā iti
tasya utsāhasya sākāṅkṣa vākya vyaṅgya tvena dahatu iti nirākāṅkṣa vākya vyaṅgya kavi bhāva aṅga tvena aprādhānya rūpayā aparipuṣṭa tayā rasa padavīm anāpta tayā
bhāva mātrasya sthāyibhāvasya iti arthaḥ
karuṇaḥ iti
tripura yuvatīnām śocya avasthā vyaṅgyaḥ karuṇaḥ tad puṣṭi kārakaḥ ṅgam iti arthaḥ
tasya ca iti
asya karuṇasya iti arthaḥ
śṛṅgāraḥ ṅgam iti anvayaḥ
tasya aṅga tā ca upamāna upameya prakarṣaṇāt

original: itthaṃ bhagavadutsāhapuṣṭasya bhagavadviṣayakavibhāvasya sākṣātparamparābhyāmaṅgabhūtau karaṇaśṛṅgārau virodhisvarūpau api aviruddhau iti darśayati---evaṃ  #
analyzed: ittham bhagavat utsāha puṣṭasya bhagavat viṣaya kavi bhāvasya sākṣāt paramparābhyām aṅga bhūtau karaṇa śṛṅgārau virodhi svarūpau api aviruddhau iti darśayati evam
ca aviśrāntī iti
a viśrānti dhāma tayā sākāṅkṣa tā āśraya tayā
aṅgi sākāṅkṣa tayā iti yāvat

original: bhagavadutsāhastu aṅgamapi bhāvasyāvirodhitvāt tadvirodho na darśitaḥ /
analyzed: bhagavat utsāhaḥ tu aṅgam api bhāvasya avirodhi tvāt tad virodhaḥ na darśitaḥ
nanu smaryyamāṇa vibhāva ādi vyaṅgyasya rasasya api

original: smaryyamāṇasya vibhāvādisāmyasya vivakṣādhīnavivakṣitasāmyasya aṅgirasena saha virodhaprasaktāvapi na virodhaityuktam,
analyzed: smaryyamāṇasya vibhāva ādi sāmyasya vivakṣā adhīna vivakṣita sāmyasya aṅgirasena saha virodha prasaktau api na virodhaḥ eti uktam
aṅgirasena saha virodha prasaktiḥ eva na asti iti āśaṅkate
locanā
a paripuṣṭa tayā vibhāva ādibhiḥ iti arthaḥ
bhāva mātrasya iti atra hetuḥ
rasa padavīm aprāptatvam aṅga tvāt iti arthaḥ
sāmya balāt āyātaḥ sadṛśa viśeṣaṇa mahimnā prāptaḥ
karuṇasya iti
karuṇasya śṛṅgara apekṣayā uṅgi tve pi bhagavat rati utsāhasya aṅga tvāt eva iti arthaḥ kiñca atra
śṛṅagāra rasasya ayam sa rasanā utkarṣa uti ādi pūrvokta diśā smaryyamāṇa tayā aṃśa bhūta tvena api
vyaktīkaraṇena na virodhaḥ

original: tathā hi yāsāṃ tripurayuvatīnāṃ praṇayaroṣanivāraṇārthaṃ kāmī nirākṛtahastagrahaṇāni kṛtavān /
analyzed: tathā hi yāsām tripura yuvatīnām praṇaya roṣa nivāraṇa artham kāmī nirākṛta hasta grahaṇāni kṛtavān

original: tāsveva niṣkaruṇāsu śāmbhavaḥ śarāgnistathā ceṣṭitavāniti sādṛśyasaṃdarśanāt smaryyamāṇenerṣyavipralambhena karuṇaḥ pratyuta puṣṭaṃ nītaḥ /
analyzed: tāsu eva niṣkaruṇāsu śāmbhavaḥ śara agniḥ tathā ceṣṭitavān iti sādṛśya saṃdarśanāt smaryyamāṇena īrṣya vipralambhena karuṇaḥ pratyuta puṣṭam nītaḥ
tena ca tripura ripu prabhāva atiśaya paripuṣṭaḥ tad viṣaya rati bhāvaḥ pariṣoṣam nīyate

original: nanu samūhālambanātmakapūrṇaghanānandarūpasya rasasya tādṛśenetararasena kathaṃ virodhaḥ sambhāvanīyaḥ ?
analyzed: nanu samūha ālambana ātmaka pūrṇaghana ānanda rūpasya rasasya tādṛśena itara rasena katham virodhaḥ sambhāvanīyaḥ
eka vākye niveśa prādurbhāvaiḥ yaugapadya viraheṇa paraspara upamardaka tva anupapatteḥ
vijña priyā
vi ya nanu iti
samūha ālambana iti prapānaka rasa nyāyāt carvyamāṇaḥ rasaḥ bhavet iti anena uktasya vibhāva ādi samūha ālambana ātmakasya
nirākāṅkṣa vākya vyaṅgya tvena ākāṅkṣā pūrttyā pūrṇasya ghanasya viṣaya antara agrahaṇe nibiḍasya ānanda rūpasya

original: rasasya aṅgirasasya tādṛśena smaryamāṇena vivakṣitasāmyena vā rasena saha kathaṃ
analyzed: rasasya aṅgirasasya tādṛśena smaryamāṇena vivakṣita sāmyena vā rasena saha katham
virodhaḥ sambhāvanīyaḥ iti arthaḥ
asambhāvanāyām hetum āha eka vākye iti
aṅgirasaḥ tāvat nirākāṅkṣa vidheya vākyāt prādurbhavati
smaryamāṇa upamānayoḥ tu sākāṅkṣa uddeśya vākyayoḥ eva prādurbhāveṇa eka vākya prādurbhava rūpa yaugapadya viraheṇa paraspara upamarddaka tva anupapatteḥ iti arthaḥ

original: tulyabalatvābhāvena pradhānabhūtena nirākāṅkṣavidheyavākyena vyaṅgyatayā pradhānena aṅhirasena balavatā smaryamāṇopamānayoreva upamardanāditi  #
analyzed: tulya bala tva abhāvena pradhāna bhūtena nirākāṅkṣa vidheya vākyena vyaṅgya tayā pradhānena aṅhi rasena balavatā smaryamāṇa upamānayoḥ eva upamardanāt iti
bhāvaḥ

original: na cāyaṃ sa rasanotkarṣotyādau nirākāṅkṣavākyaireva smaryamāṇaśṛṅgāra iti vācyam /
analyzed: na ca ayam sa rasanā utkarṣa utyādau nirākāṅkṣa vākyaiḥ eva smaryamāṇa śṛṅgāraḥ iti vācyam
rasanā utkarṣi ādi karaḥ yam hastaḥ patitaḥ iti evam vidheya pātitya sākāṅkṣa tvāt eva

original: teṣāṃ vidheyapātityaṃ tu karuṇavyañjakameva śṛṅgārasya vyaṅgyatve 'pi parokṣatvādeva smaryamāṇatopacāra iti bodhyam /
analyzed: teṣām vidheya pātityam tu karuṇa vyañjakam eva śṛṅgārasya vyaṅgya tve pi parokṣa tvāt eva smaryamāṇa tā upacāraḥ iti bodhyam
na api aṅga aṅgi bhāvaḥ
dvayoḥ api pūrṇa tayā svātantryeṇa viśrānteḥ
vijña priyā
raḥ ittham smaryamāṇa upamānayoḥ virodha aprasaktim darśayitvā aṅgini aṅga tva māptayoḥ aṅga aṅgi bhāva asambhavam eva a śahkatena api aṅga aṅgi bhāvaḥ iti
dvayoḥ api iti
śṛṅgāra karuṇayoḥ virodhinoḥ iti arthaḥ
svātantryeṇa iti

original: kṣipta ityādivākyānāṃ kāmīva ityādivākyasya canirākāṅkṣatvena tadvyaṅgyatvādityarthaḥ /
analyzed: kṣiptaḥ ityādi vākyānām kāmīvaḥ ityādi vākyasya ca nirākāṅkṣa tvena tad vyaṅgya tvāt iti arthaḥ
svātantryam eva ca pūrṇa tā
ākāṅkṣāyāḥ pūrṇa tvāt
locanā
nanu samūha ityādi yadi rasayoḥ virodhaḥ syāt
yadi vai aṅga aṅgi bhāvaḥ syāt
na tu etat prakāra dvitayam api rasayoḥ sambhavati
katham virodhaḥ na sambhavati iti āha paraspara upamardaka tva anupapatteḥ
paraspara upamardaka tvam katham anupapannam iti āha eka vākya iti eka vākya nirdeśe ca prādurbhāvasya eka vākya nirdeśa hetukasya yaugapadyasya virahāt
ayam arthaḥ yaugapadyam hi eka vākya nirdeśena eva sambhavati
sa tu rasayoḥ na sambhavati
atra hetuḥ samūha iti
ayam arthaḥ dvis ukta prakāreṇa vibhāva ādi samūha ālambana tvāt
vibhāva ādi sāmagrī khalu eka vākyasya arthaḥ
ekā ca sāmagrī katham virodhinoḥ dvayoḥ api syāt
katham eka vākya hetukam paripūrṇa tvam syāt
ghana śabdaḥ hi vijātīya anavacchinna pravāha tvam
aṅgāṅgibhāva asambhave hetum āha na api iti
aṅga aṅgi bhāvaḥ upakārya upakāri tvam
satyam uktam

original: ata evātra pradhānetareṣu raseṣu svātantryaviśrāmarāhityātpūrṇarasabhāvamātrācca vilakṣaṇatayā saṃcārirasanāmnā vyapadeśaḥ prācyānām /
analyzed: atas eva atra pradhāna itareṣu raseṣu svātantrya viśrāma rāhityāt pūrṇa rasa bhāva mātrāt ca vilakṣaṇa tayā saṃcārirasa nāmnā vyapadeśaḥ prācyānām
asmad pitāmaha anuja kavi paṇḍita mukhya śrī caṇḍīdāsa pādānām tu khaṇḍarasa nāmnā
vijña priyā
vi la samādhatte satyam iti

original: ekavākyavyaṅgyatvābhāve 'pi dvayornirākaṅkṣavākyavyaṅgyatve 'pi ca śṛṅgāravati karuṇāpratītyā virodhāprasaktirastyeva /
analyzed: eka vākya vyaṅgya tva abhāve pi dvayoḥ nirākaṅkṣa vākya vyaṅgya tve pi ca śṛṅgāravati karuṇā pratītyā virodha aprasaktiḥ asti eva

original: kintu smaryamāṇaśṛṅgārapekṣayā anubhūyamānasyopamānaśṛṅgārāpekṣayā upameyasya ca karuṇasya paryantikapratītiviṣayatayā prādhānyam /
analyzed: kintu smaryamāṇa śṛṅgāra apekṣayā anubhūyamānasya upamāna śṛṅgāra apekṣayā upameyasya ca karuṇasya paryantika pratīti viṣaya tayā prādhānyam

original: evaṃ karuṇāpekṣayā bhagavati kavibhāvasya ca pāryantikapratītiviṣayatvena prādhānyam /
analyzed: evam karuṇā apekṣayā bhagavati kavi bhāvasya ca pāryantika pratīti viṣaya tvena prādhānyam

original: ityataḥ tādṛśapradhānetareṣu karuṇetaratra śṛṅgāre bhāvetaratra karuṇe ślokāntare
analyzed: ityatas tādṛśa pradhāna itareṣu karuṇā itaratra śṛṅgāre bhāva itaratra karuṇe śloka antare
ca anya itaratra anyasmin rase ca pāryantika pratīti viṣaya tā rūpa svatantra viśrānti rāhityāt
tad vaśena pūrṇa rasa bhāva mātrāt mukhya rasāt vilakṣaṇa tayā vyapadeśa viśeṣaḥ iti arthaḥ
khaṇḍa rasa nāmnā iti atra api vyapadeśaḥ iti anvayaḥ
locanā
siddhāntam āha satyam uktam iti
atas eva virodhasya aṅga aṅgi bhāvasya ca asambhavāt
bhāva mātra vailakṣaṇyam ca āpātataḥ sva sāmagrī paripuṣṭa tayā
yat āhuḥ
aṅgam saṃsargaḥ yadi aṅgī syāt rasa antare
na āsvādyate samagram tat tatas khaṇḍarasaḥ smṛtaḥ
iti
vijña priyā
caṇḍīdāsa ukte khaṇḍa rasa vyapadeśe yoga artha vaśāt saṃvādam āha aṅgam iti
bādhyaḥ yaḥ rasaḥ saḥ ṅga bādhya tvam eva
kīdṛśam iti atra āha atha saṃsargāt iti
atha sambodhane

original: ekapadyabodhyatārūpāt saṃsargāt yadi rasāntare aṅgaprakarṣakaṃ syāttadā bādhya ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: eka padya bodhya tā rūpāt saṃsargāt yadi rasa antare aṅga prakarṣakam syāt tadā bādhyaḥ iti arthaḥ
yoga artha viśeṣa vaśāt khaṇḍa rasa vyapadeśaḥ iti āha na āsvādyate iti
pāryantika pratīti viṣaye eva samagna āsvādaḥ iti bhāvaḥ
ittham pāryantika pratīti viṣayasya bādhaka tvam

original: atathābhūtasya ca bādhyatvaṃ svaṇḍarasatvaṃ ca ityuktam /
analyzed: atathābhūtasya ca bādhya tvam su aṇḍa rasa tvam ca iti uktam
locanā

original: (lo, u) yadyaṅgī rasaḥ aparipuṣṭatayā bhāvamātravailakṣaṇyenāpātatamātrataḥ prādhānyenābhivyaktaḥ samagraṃ nāsvādyata iti pastantratvāt,
analyzed: yadi aṅgī rasaḥ a paripuṣṭa tayā bhāva mātra vailakṣaṇyena āpātata mātrataḥ prādhānyena abhivyaktaḥ samagram na āsvādyate iti
nyūna aṅga samagrīka tvāt
samagra apuṣṭa tvāt ca
nanu ādyaḥ karuṇa vībhatsa raudra vīra bhayānakaiḥ iti ukta nayena virodhinoḥ bora śṛṅgārayoḥ katham ekatra
vijña priyā

original: (vi, śa) yatra tu kapole jānakyā ityatra vilodhinoḥ śṛṅgāravīrarasayornedṛśo bādhyabādhakabhāvastatra
analyzed: yatra tu kapole jānakyāḥ iti atra vilodhinoḥ śṛṅgāra vīra rasayoḥ nā īdṛśaḥ bādhya bādhaka bhāvaḥ tatra

original: tayoḥ kathaṃ sanniveśa ityāśaṅkya tu vīraśṛṅgārayorvirodhaṃ paroktaṃ darśayati---nanvādya iti /
analyzed: tayoḥ katham sanniveśaḥ iti āśaṅkya tu vīra śṛṅgārayoḥ virodham para uktam darśayati nanu ādye iti
ādyaḥ śṛṅgāraḥ karuṇā ādi bhayānaka antaiḥ virudhyate iti vākya antare

original: ityuktanayena viruddhayoḥ kathamekatra vīraśṛṅgārayoḥ sanniveśa ityanvayaḥ /
analyzed: iti ukta nayena viruddhayoḥ katham ekatra vīra śṛṅgārayoḥ sanniveśaḥ iti anvayaḥ
locanā
lo ū ādyaḥ śṛṅgāraḥ
katham ekatra ityasya upari tatena ityādau sanniveśaḥ iti anena sambandhaḥ
kapole jānakyāḥ kari kalabha danta dyuti muṣi smara smera sphāra uḍḍamara pulakam vaktra kamalam

original: muhuḥ paśyañchṛṇvan rajanicarasenākalakalaṃ jaṭājūṭgranthiṃ draḍhayati raghūṇāṃ parivṛḍhaḥ” //
analyzed: muhur paśyan śṛṇvan rajanicara senā kalakalam jaṭā jūṭ granthim draḍhayati raghūṇām parivṛḍhaḥ
ityādau samaveśaḥ
vijña priyā
vi sa kapolaḥ ityādi

original: ślokārthastu raghūṇāṃ parivṛḍhaḥ prabhuḥ rāmaḥ jānakyā vaktrakamalaṃ muhuḥ paśyan kharadūṣaṇādirajanicarasenākalakalaṃ śṛṇvān jaṭājūṭasya jaṭāsamūhasya  #
analyzed: śloka arthaḥ tu raghūṇām parivṛḍhaḥ prabhuḥ rāmaḥ jānakyāḥ vaktra kamalam muhur paśyan khara dūṣaṇa ādi rajanicara senā kalakalam śṛṇvān jaṭā jūṭasya jaṭā samūhasya
granthim draḍhayati
